data.text:
Hospedería Prepirineo*

Undués-Pintano

Offering a restaurant serving local cuisine, Hospedería Prepirineo is located in Undués-Pintano. Set by Regal River, the air-conditioned Inn has free Wi-Fi and impressive views... view morefrom

€ 25Casa Sarasa

Berdún

Offering a picturesque setting, this charming country house is situated in Berdún’s medieval town, in the Aragonese Pyrenees. Free Wi-Fi and barbecue facilities are available... view morefrom

€ 64Parador de Sos del Rey Católico

Sos del Rey Católico

Once an Aragonese mansion, this hotel is located in the centre of this charming Medieval town and has delightful interiors including a fantastic restaurant with a fine wine selection... view morefrom

€ 80Albergue de Juventud de Sos del Rey Católico

Sos del Rey Católico

This comfortable hostel is located in the historic centre. Set in a traditional stone building, it offers free Wi-fi and organised activities, 2 minutes’ walk from the 14th century San Esteban Church... view moreHotel Triskel

Sos del Rey Católico

Located in Sos del Rey Católico, Hotel Triskel offers free Wi-Fi in public areas and features a garden and terrace with mountain view. Pamplona is a 50-minute drive away... view morefrom
